actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States allowing the President to veto any item of appropriation or any provision in any Act or joint resolution containing an item of appropriation.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Grants the President line item veto authority with respect to appropriations legislation.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States allowing the President to veto any item of appropriation or any provision in any Act or joint resolution containing an item of appropriation.
